SELECT rp.id_ as id, rd.id_ as deploymentId, rd.name_ as name, rd.category_ as category, rp.key_ as flowKey, rp.version_ as version, rp.suspension_state_ as suspensionState, rd.deploy_time_ as deploymentTime, sf.form_name as formName, sf.form_id as formId FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF rp LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT rd ON rp.deployment_id_ = rd.id_ LEFT JOIN sys_deploy_form df ON df.deploy_id = rd.id_ LEFT JOIN sys_form sf ON sf.form_id = df.form_id
and rd.name_ like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
order by rd.deploy_time_ desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY rp.KEY_ ORDER BY rp.VERSION_ DESC) AS rn, rp.id_ as id, rd.id_ as deploymentId, rd.name_ as name, rd.category_ as category, rp.key_ as flowKey, rp.version_ as version, rp.suspension_state_ as suspensionState, rd.deploy_time_ as deploymentTime, sf.form_name as formName, sf.form_id as formId FROM ACT_RE_PROCDEF rp LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_DEPLOYMENT rd ON rp.deployment_id_ = rd.id_ LEFT JOIN sys_deploy_form df ON df.deploy_id = rd.id_ LEFT JOIN sys_form sf ON sf.form_id = df.form_id
and rd.name_ like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY rd.deploy_time_ DESC )AS temp WHERE rn = 1
SELECT id,proc_ins_id AS procInsId,process_title AS processTitle FROM sys_process_title WHERE proc_ins_id=#{procInsId}
